agenda.description: SENATE NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Higher Education TIME & DATE: 9:00 AM, Wednesday, April 3, 2019 PLACE: E1.028 (Hearing Room) CHAIR: Senator Brandon Creighton SB 16 Hancock | et al. Relating to a student loan repayment assistance program for certain persons who agree to employment as full-time peace officers in this state. SB 499 Seliger Relating to the requirement that certain participating institutions under the student loan program administered by the Texas Higher Education Coordinating Board provide loan debt information to students. SB 882 Menéndez Relating to the establishment of the Texas First Generation Matching Scholarship Program for certain first generation students at public institutions of higher education. SB 945 Watson Relating to drug or alcohol overdose awareness and response training for residential advisors and officers of student organizations at public or private institutions of higher education. SB 1162 Bettencourt | et al. Relating to student success-based funding for certain public institutions of higher education. SB 1504 Zaffirini Relating to the allocation of funds remaining in the B-On-Time student loan account following the abolition of that account. SB 1755 Creighton Relating to the status of certain medical residents and fellows as governmental employees for purposes of the Texas Tort Claims Act. Pending business Those wishing to give public testimony, please limit prepared remarks to 3 minutes. If submitting written testimony, please submit 20 copies, with your name on each copy, to the Committee during the hearing.
